titleStmt.title: Emery Whitaker et al. to Beriah Magoffin
CWG9359

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons and Remissions, 1859-1862

body.p: To his Excelency Bariah Magoffin Govener of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

The undersigned members of the Mason Bar respectfully solicit you to pardon David Douglass convicted of manslaughter at the present April term of the Mason Circuit Court They concur with the jury by whom he was tried: that his cause (as one for the fit exercise of Executive clemency. and hope you will pardon him and restore him to his family.

Emery Whitaker.
Geo W Tulser
Will P. Coons
Jno M Duke Jr
Jno R. Clarke
W P Conwells
W.. S.. Frank
J G Hickman
Jno D Taylor
H. P Whitaker.
Tho B Stevenson
H Taylor
W H Savage
Wm B Parker Jailor
W. W. Baldwin Sheff M. C
